meanings.definition: The quality of being distinguishable or different from others.
meanings.sent1: Her distinctiveness in style made her stand out from the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The distinctiveness of his voice made him easily recognizable on the radio.
meanings.sent3: His distinctiveness in wearing mismatched socks always brought a smile to people's faces.
meanings.sent4: The distinctiveness of her laughter echoed through the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The distinctiveness of the painting left a lasting impression on all who saw it.

meanings.definition: A unique or characteristic feature that sets something apart.
meanings.sent1: The distinctiveness of the logo made the brand instantly recognizable.
meanings.sent2: The distinctiveness of the architecture reflected the city's rich history.
meanings.sent3: The distinctiveness of the cake's decoration made it the talk of the party.
meanings.sent4: The distinctiveness of the scent brought back memories of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The distinctiveness of her smile brightened up the entire room.

meanings.definition: The state of being easily recognized or identified.
meanings.sent1: The distinctiveness of the landmark helped tourists find their way around the city.
meanings.sent2: The distinctiveness of his handwriting made it easy to spot among others.
meanings.sent3: The distinctiveness of the cat's meow always made everyone turn their heads.
meanings.sent4: The distinctiveness of the melody lingered in his mind long after the concert.
meanings.sent5: The distinctiveness of the scent instantly transported her back to her childhood home.
